recipe.name: Heat Up Lard
recipe.description: Put the Lard in a large pan/pot as thats that will be used for frying later.

recipe.name: Mix Flour, Salt, and Baking Powder
recipe.description: Put the flour in a bowl and slowly mix in the baking powder and salt.

recipe.name: Mix Milk, Lard, and Water
recipe.description: Mix in the milk and 8 spoons of melted lard then mix. Slowly add 1 cup of water to the mixture, or until dough is ready. Make sure you turn the stove off to prevent the lard from boiling too early.

recipe.name: Kneed The Dough
recipe.description: Kneed the dough for a couple of minutes until it is ready. Add flour as needed.

recipe.name: Roll The Dough
recipe.description: Split your dough into palm-shaped balls and roll them out until flat. Make sure you leave a hole in the center to let the lard not bubble under. Start boiling the lard on low

recipe.name: Fry The Dough
recipe.description: Dip the rolled out dough in the boiling lard one at a time for 1.5 minutes on one side, then flip for another 1.5 minutes on the other. Make sure you pop any large bubbles that start to form

recipe.name: Take Dough Out and Season
recipe.description: Take the torta frita out and add toppings of your choice.
